sentences: Australia, for the UMBRELLA GROUP, emphasized the importance of finalizing work at this session to avoid over-burdening the agenda in Copenhagen.
The Czech Republic, for the EU, urged streamlining work under the four subsidiary bodies and working cooperatively.
Grenada, for AOSIS, welcomed intersessional work on adaptation, disaster risk management and economic resilience.
Sudan, for the G-77/CHINA, highlighted technology transfer and the need for progress on the Nairobi Work Programme (NWP).
